00026         public App()
00027         {
00028             PrepareContainer();
00029             InitializeComponent();
00030 
00031             var OverviewPage = new Xamarin.Forms.NavigationPage(new OverviewPage());
00032             var MedicationPage = new Xamarin.Forms.NavigationPage(new MedicationPage());
00033             var SendDataPage = new Xamarin.Forms.NavigationPage(new SendDataPage());
00034             var ProfilePage = new Xamarin.Forms.NavigationPage(new ProfilePage());
00035 
00036             OverviewPage.On<Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOS>().SetPrefersLargeTitles(true);
00037             OverviewPage.SetValue(Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOSSpecific.NavigationPage.StatusBarTextColorModeProperty, Color.White);
00038             OverviewPage.BarBackgroundColor = Color.FromRgb(25, 25, 40);
00039             OverviewPage.BarTextColor = Color.FromHex("FFFFFF");
00040              
00041             //MedicationPage.On<Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOS>().SetPrefersLargeTitles(true);
00042             MedicationPage.SetValue(Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOSSpecific.NavigationPage.StatusBarTextColorModeProperty, Color.White);
00043             MedicationPage.BarBackgroundColor = Color.FromRgb(25, 25, 40);
00044             MedicationPage.BarTextColor = Color.FromHex("FFFFFF");
00045 
00046             SendDataPage.On<Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOS>().SetPrefersLargeTitles(true);
00047             SendDataPage.SetValue(Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOSSpecific.NavigationPage.StatusBarTextColorModeProperty, Color.White);
00048             SendDataPage.BarBackgroundColor = Color.FromRgb(25, 25, 40);
00049             SendDataPage.BarTextColor = Color.FromHex("FFFFFF");
00050 
00051             ProfilePage.On<Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOS>().SetPrefersLargeTitles(true);
00052             ProfilePage.SetValue(Xamarin.Forms.PlatformConfiguration.iOSSpecific.NavigationPage.StatusBarTextColorModeProperty, Color.White);
00053             ProfilePage.BarBackgroundColor = Color.FromRgb(25, 25, 40);
00054             ProfilePage.BarTextColor = Color.FromHex("FFFFFF");
00055 
00056             var tabs = new TabbedPage
00057             {
00058                 BarBackgroundColor = Color.FromRgb(25, 25, 40)
00059             };
00060 
00061             tabs.Children.Add(OverviewPage);
00062             tabs.Children.Add(MedicationPage);
00063             tabs.Children.Add(SendDataPage);
00064             tabs.Children.Add(ProfilePage);
00065 
00066             tabs.Children[0].Title = "Übersicht";
00067             tabs.Children[1].Title = "Medikation";
00068             tabs.Children[2].Title = "Senden";
00069             tabs.Children[3].Title = "Profil";
00070              
00071             MainPage = tabs;
00072         }

00092         private static void PrepareContainer()
00093         {
00094             var containerBuilder = new ContainerBuilder();
00095             containerBuilder.RegisterType<ModelFacade>().As<IModelFacade>().SingleInstance();
00096             containerBuilder.RegisterType<Bluetooth>().As<IBluetooth>().SingleInstance();
00097             containerBuilder.RegisterType<EntityDatabase>().As<IEntityDatabase>().SingleInstance();
00098             containerBuilder.RegisterType<EntityFactory>().As<IEntityFactory>().SingleInstance();
00099             containerBuilder.RegisterType<ParserFacade>().As<IParserFacade>().SingleInstance();
00100             container = containerBuilder.Build();
00101         }
00102 
00107         public static IModelFacade GetModel()
00108         {
00109             return container.Resolve<IModelFacade>();
00110         }
